This study hypothesize femur expose unilateral vibration may affect rest muscle electrical activity contralateral hip adductor . Vibration effectively enhance muscle strength power . Previous study show vibration increase muscle electromyographic ( EMG ) activity . It show bone effect increase muscle EMG activity cause vibration healthy young adult study . In study , report vibrations-induced increase muscle electrical activity flexor carpus radialis ( FCR ) relate ultradistal radius bone mineral content ( BMC ) FCR H-reflex suppress depressed vibration . DOC.brief_title: Effects Unilateral WBV Muscleactivity Contralateral Hip Adductor
DOC.detailed_description: A total 20 voluntary plan include study . Vibration apply right low extremity whole-body vibration ( PowerPlate Pro ) . Cases stand vibration plate . WBV apply frequency 40 Hz amplitude 2 mm 60 second . WBV apply one session . The rest muscle electrical activity ipsilateral contralateral hip adductor muscle rest measure PowerLab ( data acquisition system , ADInstruments , Australia ) device.The rest-EMGrms measure vibration . We also evaluate change contralateral soleus H reflex vibration . Effects bone rest muscle electrical activity assess hip bone mineral density , bone mineral content serum sclerostin level . The right hip bone mineral density ( BMD ) BMC evaluate bone densitometer ( Norland ) . Plasma sclerostin level measure use Human Sclerostin ELISA kÄ±t vibration .
DOC.criteria: Age : 2040 yr Gender : Male Volunteer Healthy status : Patients hypoesthesia leg Healthy subject Dominant hand : Righthanded Bone disease ( osteoporosis , osteomalacia , paget 's disease , neoplasm , etc ) , Systemic diseases ( cardiovascular , endocrine , infection etc ) , Myopathytendinopathy Lower limb joint disease Vertigo Obesity ( BMI > 30 kg/m2 ) Professional sportsman Male regular sport activity Skin disease lower limb Noncooperative subject Hemolysis blood sample
